document_data.name: Jhavanter
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Hall of Heroes|47}}{{cite book/Cult of the Dragon|59}}
document_data.mainbody: [[Jhavanter]] was a [[wizard]] and the teacher of [[Garthond Shessair]].
document_data.Relationships: Garthond Shessair apprenticed under Jhavanter in his youth.
document_data.History:
He was an enemy of the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. They had fought in [[Sembia]] and nearby locations multiple times.

The cult eventually destroyed him in battle and seized his tower.
